website_summaries.verdict: Though customers have griped about a few flaws, many more loved the feeder for its attractive style and bird-attracting qualities.
pros: Compliments any outdoor area with its antique looks, etched glass bottle, and metallic finish base
Wide opening makes it easy to fill and 20 oz
cons: On the higher end of the price range
Some leaks have been reported, as well as a few faulty jars that broke with regular use

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird Party
customer_reviews.text: We now have about 25-30 hummingbirds ( a few months ago we had about 4!!!!!) We have 3 different feeders and this seems to be the one they like best. ( Check out the VIDEO!!!!) It's easy to clean, but you do have to wait until it's completely empty to fill it (because you turn it upside down and unscrew it)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It broke after a month. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago. I took it down today and washed it to prepare to refill it. The water was warm, not hot. I took out some hummingbird solution that I had in my refrigerator and poured it into the container. As I was about to attach the plastic pieces and invert it, the base of the jar broke off in two pieces. Glass in the sink. Sugar solution everywhere. What a mess. Apparently, this low quality glass can't hold up to mild thermal stress. Very disappointing. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: kindred spirit

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Feeder For My Bird Friendly Yard
customer_reviews.text: Received this today and it's a pretty feeder. One photo shows it hanging on my back porch with about 1 cup of nectar and the other photo shows that it comes in 3 parts. The glass is green like the color of an old Coke bottle, the middle section is metal with metal flowers and looks like copper or maybe anodized aluminum and the bottom is plastic. This is a better looking product than I found at the local big box because of the heavy green glass, the copper colored metal upper base and the strong looking metal hanger.
customer_reviews.author: InspectorMCP

customer_reviews.title: Poor, longterm quality - Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month of regular use, the glass completed cracked off along the top of the bottle where the hanger sits and I can no longer use it. When it did work, the birds loved it so now they are angry! Because it is outside of my return window on Amazon, I am stuck with a faulty product and can't exchange or get a refund. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful feeder that looks beautiful and attracts many hummingbirds!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom. We moved to the desert where there are no signs of life, no cute critters to be seen. I hoped this would attract some tiny hummingbirds in front of the kitchen window to cheer my mom up. It only took 1 day for the birds to find it! I opted not to hang it on a chain, instead letting the birds use the hanger as a perch. The little guy you see in the picture stops by faithfully everyday at lunchtime!
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed feeder
customer_reviews.text: Although the glass bowl is very nice, the bottom will not allow the syrup to come through the flower ports and the birds cannot access it. All they would do is fly around it then finally stopped all together. I ended up putting my old feeder back up and they came around immediately. Very poor design and do not recommend wasting money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney D.

customer_reviews.title: Ah the little guys and gals love it!
customer_reviews.text: I decided it was finally time to retire the generic plastic red feeder that I had, and get a high quality feeder, and one that these birds can stand on and relax. They fight over this feeder even more than the last one! The feeder itself is very nice and heavy, seems to be of high quality, easy to clean, and is certainly not leaking. I'm considering getting a second feeder, and if I do, it will be another of these.
customer_reviews.author: peterbee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item, resting place for humming birds feet & holds quite a lot of nectar.
customer_reviews.text: We love the look, it has that old fashioned decor abut it. Made of quality material. Metal base with some plastic. Glass jar for the nectar. Our humming birds LOVE that they can rest on each perch and don't have to continually flutter while trying to get a nice cool drink of sugar water. 😍 NOTE: If you appreciated this review please give it a “thumbs up/like” your helping me to continue to give honest/unbiased insight into products I’ve used and you may have questions about. Interested in a product but don't know enough about it and would like it reviewed? Please let me know and I'll see what I can do... Thank you 🙏
customer_reviews.author: Symbols Of LoveTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March but just went to use it for the first time today and it was a FAIL. I poured nectar in and it immediately started pouring out. Didn't have a chance to screw the bottom on or anything. I picked it up to hold it over the sink and the whole bottom/top just fell off. Looks like it was just glued on. Didn't even get to use it one time and it says it's too late for me to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Avoid! Lovely look but BAD DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: From the get-go I liked the look, but once I started trying to unscrew/rescrew it there is not any right spot to grip it? Nothing about the dish and its cover are connected so they just slide around on each other and the cover threatens cutting you. The glass was delicately handled, no drops or bangs of any kind, and yet it started to leak a ton within the first week. I just liked nothing about this other than how it looked; but the lived experience was bad from beginning to end.
customer_reviews.author: burkypants

customer_reviews.title: Should last many years outside in the weather
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well made and its design is well thought out. Nice thick metal hanger that is well secured to the main glass body. The glass body is very thick and sturdy, with a large mouth that you can easily get a regular kitchen scrubber with handle down into for thorough scrubbing. The bottom is 2 piece, with the top part being metal for long life in the sun and weather and bottom is plastic for corrosion resistance. Everything is easily taken apart and cleaned. I'm sure this feeder will last many years. My Hummingbirds took to it immediately and fed away.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Moutray

customer_reviews.title: Buy cheap plastic feeder instead
customer_reviews.text: I have a cheap red feeder that is used constantly. The hummingbirds rarely use this one. I even tried using red syrup. They are not interested in this feeder. It is not worth the money. The packaging was poorly done. Surprised it survived shipment, the feeder was rolling around loose in the box. Think I will add lights inside and call it decorative instead of functional.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Blomberg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but arrived with cracks
customer_reviews.text: I loved the vintage look of this feeder and ordered it in the late fall so that it would be ready as soon as the weather warmed up in the spring. unfortunately I just filled it for the first time last week and found that the bottom of the bottle when sitting on the counter and (top when hanging) has two small cracks in it. The cracks were not noticable when I took it out of the package when it originally arrived, but filling it made them easily noticable as the nectar leaked out in two spots. I've had the hummingbird feeder too long to return it which is disappointing. I should have tested it when it first arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: At first I really liked this feeder
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this feeder...it is solidly built and looks good, but after having it for a couple weeks now, I am noticing the water does not continuously flow and I have to bump it periodically to get the water to come up to the feeder holes...the little hummingbirds can't get their beaks in far enough to get the nectar,,,a huge design flaw in my opinion...I cant figure out why it is doing that...there is not much mention of this from all the reveiwers that have gushed on about this feeder...I can't be the only one with this problem...
customer_reviews.author: JBPENCO

customer_reviews.title: Top falls off.
customer_reviews.text: As much as the hummingbirds loved this feeder, it's my second one where the top of the glass cylinder broke off. No idea how this could happen other than poor production. They've never been dropped or in hot water, always carefully handled. Very strange that the top would cleanly fall off. I was so surprised and perplexed that I decided to purchase another to replace it and within two weeks, it happened again. If you like this feeder, purchase from another manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Good feeder, but not all metal and glass -the nectar basin is plastic-love the wide mouth
customer_reviews.text: Although it states is is all metal and glass and no plastic, the bottom piece that holds the nectar ( basin) is plastic. The feeder is great, love the wide mouth of the jar but I really wanted a metal nectar holder. I have had quite a few similar feeders that have the same type plastic nectar holder and after the first year they are almost impossible to keep clean or mildew and mold free. I will follow up next year to see how the plastic basin holds up. I sincerely hope it does. Otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Locklair

customer_reviews.title: UGLY bottom tray won’t last very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is ugly. Probably my fault because you can’t see the design well In the photos. I assumed it was a fleur de lis, it is a tulip with weird images around it (supposed to be leaves?) not sure about the stuff above it. I was looking for vintage this is more Pennsylvania Dutch. Not happy with this at all. Everything seems sturdy but the bottom tray that the glass screws into is plastic, so if it drops it will crack or if it gets screwed in wrong or hard it will crack. Not sure what I’ll do with it. UPS left box out in the rain so I can’t return it. Will NOT gift it-too ugly. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: It is impossible to fill without making a sticky mess...... unless the unit is bone dry; because it is filled by unscrewing the glass from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: larry m shrier

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and ease of cleaning. Unfortunately it's not my Hummers first choice. They go for my old faded plastic one first but will go to this one if chased or scared away from it. The reason it only got 3 stars though is because there is a bit of rust on the under side of all the drink holes. That part is metal while the bottom/saucer piece is plastic. I worry that this could be harmful to the birds. Looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: 1shopper

customer_reviews.title: I Had Almost Given Up
customer_reviews.text: I had almost given up on hummingbird feeders. They often don’t hold up in the elements, they are a nightmare to clean, they leak, etc. At one point, I even just put out a red ceramic mug with nectar. Unfortunately, the squirrels loved it too, lol. This feeder, however, has been a delight! I love the design; from the retro-glass to the easy-to-clean wide mouth. The hummers LOVE it. It’s like I have a Giant Bee colony swarming it out there, if you see it from a distance. It is a joy to watch. I can’t say how it will hold up over time, but we’re definitely off to a promising start!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H.

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: After placing it in service, I was pleased with the Ruby throats response. The perches are exactly perfect for the little birds. The beak holes are exactly perfect in position for the hummers. When I took my perfect feeder down, the bottom of the bottle broke off in my hand. Courtesy of Gorilla Glue and friction tape placed to protect the glass from the metal band that suspends the feeder, my feeder is back in use. I will never purchase anything from this importer again. The construction is of inferior glass.
customer_reviews.author: Earle H. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Poor plastic material
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this product has lasted only 2 1/2 months due to the poor materials. The plastic base was so soft that it crossthreaded and made the feeder useless. The metal and glass are still viable (although closer reading of the rating have me worried) and there is no way to substitute or repair the proprietary pieces. You might buy another feeder from a different company just in case you get screwed by the screw base but if you can only afford one, get the other one instead.
customer_reviews.author: F. Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Decent feeder that's very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: The perch rings are just a bit too large and too far and low away from the feeding ports making it difficult for the smaller Anna's and Rufous around here to perch and drink at the same time. Other than that it's nice looking and easy to clean. They still use this feeder(the birds) but it isn't nearly as popular as our other feeders, including the 25oz MoreBirds mason jar variety (with the smaller perch ring that circles around the base).
customer_reviews.author: EyewandersTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: No more bees !
customer_reviews.text: I love this feeder ! I t is easy to clean due to the wide opening. The bee problem I had before has been solved as they can`t get to the nectar. Before I used to have only 2 humming birds visit and now I have 5 and they even share the feeding stations simultaneously . I am feeding with 3/4 cup sugar to 3 cups water. This lasts 1 week. They seem to love this formula and feed all throughout the day. Thank you for this great design !
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Sad humming birds....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. It’s pretty, but looks a little cheap- the metal on the top doesn’t stay in place. I tried to empty the solution out over my patio and the metal hanger on the top slipped out of my hand into the unknown like Elsa. Never to be seen agian... so it no longer hangs. The humming birds won’t come around my patio table to eat... I guess they are as civilized as most other birds. They like to eat in the air.... but I can’t hang it anymore. :(
customer_reviews.author: Higginspartyof6

customer_reviews.title: Don't Ask Me, Ask My Hummingbirds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 new feeders this year to see if the hummingbirds would choose a favorite. All of the feeders were cleaned in the identical way and the food was the same (4 parts water; one part sugar) and the verdict was always the same. This one wins hands down every time. When I move the feeders to the different places, they always come back to this one. If you want the best feeder, don't worry about the others, just buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: jockbroker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty feeder with a minor design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I love the appearance of this feeder. It is tricky to hang after filling the jar ...you have to flip it quickly because it leaks when tilted. I lost quite a bit of juice on the first try. I also found that the hanger was inconvenient because it is not fixed in place and keeps sliding down while you try to hang it. I fixed this flaw by using fish line to secure the hanger to the top of the jar. So far, I am waiting for the hummingbirds to arrive but they may have already migrated! I will be ready next year.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird Paradise
customer_reviews.text: 1- It's beautiful. 2- It's well made. The entire thing shines and the glass is thick. I was worried about the glass when I ordered it fearing it might be subject to freezing and breakage. We've already had several nights with the temp in the low 20's---no problems. 3- And this is the most important reason, my wife loves it...'nuff said! LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle Albea

customer_reviews.title: Best hummingbird feeder I've ever found. You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hummingbird feeder so much, I have now purchased three - two of this red style and one of the clear. The hummies love it so much they keep me hopping to keep them filled, and cleaning and refilling these beauties is a snap, thanks to the simple construction and the positively enormous 'mouth' of the bottle. Just a joy to own all around; any labor required to maintain is paid back in excess to the delight of watching birds positively mob these feeders.
customer_reviews.author: xeyda

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, we had hummingbirds the first week.
customer_reviews.text: We make our own feed so it isn't dyed bright red so I was worried this wasn't bright enough to get the hummingbirds attention but liked the look so thought I would give it a shot. We had hummingbirds within a few days and sometimes three, going to get another one to put behind the house so the will quit fighting. We see them at all times of the day and into dusk. I would and have recommended this to friends, however if they are elderly or have arthritis they may have trouble putting it together to refill as it does all come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly Bear

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbirds delight, mine, too
customer_reviews.text: I added this feeder to my yard recently, now I have two! Hummers are a passion of mine, and this is a gorgeous product, sturdier than the one I already had. Wider opening than my other feeder, so fairly easy to clean. Large size, holds just over 2 cups. The glass is so pretty; looks like an old fashioned Mason-type jar, with pressed glass design. Good price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Z

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and high quality feeder.
customer_reviews.text: This by far the best feeder we've had so far. The feeder itself is very nice and heavy, seems to be of high quality, easy to clean and is certainly not leaking. We just purchased a second feeder since we live in Southern CA. I can never get enough of my resident hummingbirds :-) . The feeder plate at the bottom comes in two pieces and easily screws onto the glass, usually without a hitch. With most feeders, you have to fight it, as the threads don't line up properly...the base is just a little bit wider than the rest of the glass, and it holds itself in place. Great design! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ghafoori

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on First Use
customer_reviews.text: I read the many reviews on this feeder and people either loved the or hated the product. I liked the design and figured I had at least a 50% chance of being satisfied. Unfortunately it cracked on its first use as I was pouring the sugar water in it. To be fair, the water was very hot. I had let it sit for a while so it wasn’t boiling, but I had not let it cool enough. The glass appeared as if it were the quality of a masonry jar which can stand stand high temperatures, but that was naive on my part. I think I should just stick with a store brand purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Feeder and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: We really like this hummingbird feeder. There are only two main parts to the base making it very easy to clean with just a base cup and a loose fitting cover that attach to the bottle. It works great and I think that the loose cover (with feeding holes) allows some ventilation and stays cleaner and doesn't mold. The bottle is heavy and very sturdy and I like the wide hanging loop because I have it mounted high under the eave of our house, and it's easy to hang using a long pole at a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The hummingbirds love it and with the wide mouth bottle, it's a breeze to keep clean. Also with the design of the metal hanger, I can set this bottle upside down while filling. I've had others where the hanger doesn't move out of the way so I couldn't set it down. This one fits all my needs, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: It leaks slowly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of last year. We finally got around to putting it out about a week ago. It seems to leak very easy. The juice appeared to be disappearing quicker than what I thought it should. Upon inspection of the feeder, I noticed dried drips along the bottom. When I tilted the feeder just slightly, I could see the juice start to come up through the holes. It was evident that it had been slowly leaking on top as there was dried juice around every feeder port. I love the widemouth jar as it's easy to clean but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Base of glass bottle tends to snap off; handle with care
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive feeder that holds lots of liquid, enough to feed the numerous hummers in my yard for a period of weeks. However, the other reviews that mention a manufacturing defect in the glass bottle are spot on. I make my own feeding solution and recently filled the glass bottle with fresh solution (figuring glass can take heat so why wait). The base snapped off in a neat circle, flooding my kitchen with warm sugar water. A properly made glass bottle should not do this!
customer_reviews.author: Mrinalini

customer_reviews.title: Birds took to this instantly.
customer_reviews.text: The birds took to this instantly. We bought this for a hummingbird nesting in our backyard and because it's glass which will be easier to clean and, quite frankly, it's just pretty. It's been filled twice and no problems with breaking, like other reviews said. Base seems to be plastic, with metal flowers. It's been impossible to catch pictures of them at the feeder between them fighting each other and momma hummer darting and scaring everyone off. Had to get another one to dissipate the fighting. I believe the hummer pictured is one of momma's babies.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Feeder!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hummingbird feeder not knowing what to expect. First, it’s so pretty to look at and I like that it’s a glass bottle. Secondly, it’s very easy to clean! I put it up on a Wednesday night and noticed my first hummingbird Saturday morning (it’s been really rainy and gross out so maybe he would have come sooner). Also, I originally bought the bird food online too, but I read that the red dyes can be harmful. I put 1/3 cup of sugar and filled the rest with luke warm water and shook it until it dissolved. So far I have one feeder but I ordered another because I heard they can get a little territorial.
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Best hummingbird feeder we've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: We have multiples of this feeder around our house and it's the best one we've ever had! The flat top makes it easy to fill with sugar in the kitchen and the wide mouth makes it easy to clean out, too. The base and perches are perfect and the hummingbirds rest on them with ease. And the volume of liquid it holds is great to extend the refill timing that much further.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Long

customer_reviews.title: Completely Defective
customer_reviews.text: The bottom does not stay on the feeder at all. I did not try it until today since I was waiting until the weather warmed up a bit. The feeder is completely un-usable. Since it's been just over 6 weeks after my purchase in early January, I can not return it. The fact that the company sold/delivered a product that doesn't even hold the liquid, which is the entire purpose of the product, is absurd. Clearly, the company has zero quality control.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Broken flowers not replaceable.
customer_reviews.text: Flowers that break off are not replaceable. Have had two of these for some time now and on one two of the flowers have broken off, which allows the yellow jackets to inter and plug the whole works up. Too expensive for not having replacements. I tried to see if I could get replacements but the answer I received was that the vender was not responsible.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice feeder that also looks a lot better than typical red plastic ones. Birds seem to love it and also like the fact it has a place where they can sit and eat without having to hover. Seems to be very good quality. Only thing I wish they had done was have the top of it recessed like a moat to keep out ants but solved that problem by putting double sided tape at of bottom of rod holding feeder and that solves the problem. Highly recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: goodoneleftTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Design for ease of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I love this feeder. I love the coloring and detail in the glass but what I love the most is the overall design. I was looking for one with a wide mouth and this one has it, which makes it super easy to clean. The lower section separates when you unscrew it for really easy cleaning and they were so thoughtful in the design to create a lip on the topside(bottom) of the bottle so the heavy wire hanger has something to hang on to. My last one, there was a metal band around the middle section of the glass and one day it gave out and my feeder was shattered on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S

customer_reviews.title: Product has lasted and feathered dinners seem pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for 3 years now and I only have one problem with them, however the hummers don’t seem to be bothered by issue. The flowers on the base lose their color and seem to rust. I thoroughly clean my two feeders and the birds drain the, within 5 days after. Love the large capacity of these feeders. My only wish is that I could order a new feeder top(part with the flowers) as the rest of the feeder is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne C. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Broke When Filled
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in June. Waited until late fall/winter for all of our hummingbird flowers to die off. Went to fill this morning and it cracked into two pieces where the top is fluted to keep the metal hanger in place. Waste of $25. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AlyWren

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbirds love it & it's easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: It's a favorite! This and one other kind are the only styles I use (I have 4 stations and LOTS of hummingbirds). This holds a nice amount of sugar water, is easy to clean thoroughly, and it's sturdy. Use an ant mote with it & get tiny brushes for its sipping holds. Remember, 4 parts water to 1 part sugar & NO DYE. Clean often; don't wait until it's empty if it's at all dirty. You'll be paid back in interest :^) with the entertaining air-dancers that'll be flying around!
customer_reviews.author: riverwoman

customer_reviews.title: That it’s cheap and junky.
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to this pretty Hummingbird feeder but I’m terrible disappointed as it wouldn’t stay together at all. Dumped the juice all over myself. I don’t like being negative but it is a piece of “junk”... I’m rarely disappointed with the thousands of dollars I’ve ordered from Amazon over the years but this one item is really poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa J. Giger

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNHAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I will not purchase this item again. I hung it up in the summer of 2016 and it held together. I stored it carefully during the winter in the house. When I took it out again for this summer, the top fell off. I saw this issue mentioned in the reviews before I purchased it but hoped I would be one of the lucky ones. Nope, it happened with mine also. Very disappointed. They are so beautiful and I was so happy with them. I still have another one. I am just waiting for the top to come off it and end up with glass and sugar water all over my new porch.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie4

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Glass Hummingbird Feeder.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hummingbird feeder. The glass is thick and sturdy. The base is metal and plastic but durable. The latch to hang the feeder is wrapped around the top of the glass. It holds on well even during high winds in my area. To clean, I simply take the feeder down and unscrew the glass from the base. Never makes a mess. I wash with warm,soapy water and let it air dry before I fill with nectar again. Great gift idea!! Yes,I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Henny~Penny

customer_reviews.title: Leaks way too easily.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want wasps stinging your hummingbirds or ants crawling all over the place, you don't want this. It has no leak blocking gasket. I'm trying to figure out how to create one. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Fattens Those Birds Right Up
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a hummingbird feeder that isn't too tacky looking, but I think this one fits the bill. One note: DON'T FILL IT WITH HOT WATER! I didn't realize this and had been putting pretty hot sugar water directly into the glass container to let it cool. One day I did this and the top just broke off. Another one was ordered (so don't worry, the humming birds aren't starving) and I just make sure that the water is luke-warm when I put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Popek

customer_reviews.title: I have lots of hummingbirds but they don't use this
customer_reviews.text: I have a small Perky Pet hummingbird feeder that is used very often. But this feeder has no takers after 2 years and I wonder if it's because there isn't enough red on it. I'm going to paint the black area red (never use dye in their liquid food) and will see if that works. But buying red paint just adds to the price of this feeder.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Second one not so good
customer_reviews.text: I have one I bought earlier. It is so wonderful I bought a second one. Well, I can now understand the several negative reviews. About 5 minutes after I hung it with a carabiner, the bottle slipped through its hanger crashing onto the bricks below it and smashing and sending wet broken glass everywhere. I hope they replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lee Kufeldt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hummingbird Feeder!
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful hummingbird feeder is my new favorite feeder. We used to always get red ones but I decided to change it this year. Our hummingbirds love it! They like it because they can sit and drink on the perches. I just use homemade juice in it so it is clear. And the birdies love to sit on the hanger wire, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Filling it is a pain!
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice. The Hummers really like it! It holds a lot. The problem is in the filling. When you turn it over to upright it, sugar water leaks out all the holes and gets on you and everything around you. But it looks really good!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Bought one of these and loved it. It did easily leak nectar from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these and loved it. It did easily leak nectar from the flowers but was tollerable. Thought I would buy another. Received it and was leaking from the base everywhere and attracting ants. They sent me another one that did the same thing! I just returned it. They need to add a rubber seal inside the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Brenmc

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like crazy. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Leaks! The plastic bottom is not flush at all with the metal top and it leaks like crazy when it’s tilted even a degree off of being perfectly flat. I want to be clear, this is serious leaking between the seam of the top and bottom fitting, not the flower holes. I would expect it to leak from the flower holes.
customer_reviews.author: A Y

customer_reviews.title: All contents leak out!
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this hummingbird feeder, and am extremely disappointed. It leaks like a sieve! There should be a washer in the screw cap to make a tight seal. The fill site does not seal when tightened and fluid leaks everywhere. Dont waste your money! I would not have given any stars if that were an option.
customer_reviews.author: cat lady

customer_reviews.title: attractive, easy to clean, holds a huge amount of nectar
customer_reviews.text: #1 thing I like about this sturdy yet attractive feeder is how easy it is to clean compared to the 4 or 5 other feeders I have had over the years. #2 is how much it holds - I have very hungry hummers and they go through the smaller capacity feeders in 2 days. #3 - it stays together, which shouldn't really have to be something that is considered an unusual plus, but I had two other feeders where the bottom wouldn't always screw on properly and about 3 minutes after hanging them up, they would come apart, no matter how careful I was to get the threads seated properly.
customer_reviews.author: H. Power

customer_reviews.title: Perch is great for hummingbirds
customer_reviews.text: Perch is great for hummingbirds. They chose this over other feeder that used to be their favorite. About 14 months after I bought it, the top of the glass broke. This was very disappointing (and I got cut). I've also had lots of trouble opening it. I've learned to press it against my hip. I guess the threads in the plastic base wore out. Despite the negatives, I'm going to rebuy because no other hummingbird feeder has a nice resting pad like this, and the hummingbirds love it.
customer_reviews.author: Outis

customer_reviews.title: Superior product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Large neck makes it easy to clean the jar without a bottle brush. Used one season without the paint fadingnoe chipping. Humming birds swarm around it like helicopters. I ordered two more and will be ordering another one this summer. They are built to last - heavy glass and sturdy wire hook. Beat quality hummingbird feeder I have found in the market. Make your own nectar with sugar and water - no red dye needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird Feeder
customer_reviews.text: Hummingbirds like this feeder. I like the feeder. The only objection I have is I purchased this on 7/30/18 for $17.24 & decided to buy a second one which I purchased for $10.86 on 8/5/18. $6.38 difference. It would have been nice for Amazon to give me a $5 add-on bottle of hummingbird liquid food for me since I purchased 2 feeders. I also purchased 2 bottles of the $5 add on food when I purchased the first feeder. It makes you wonder about being a loyal customer. I have ordered many items lately through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Feeder- Just Lovely- Long Lasting!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful hummingbird feeder. We made our own feed and it displays nicely. We've seen some hummingbirds around but haven't spotted any at the feeder yet. I'm sure it's just a matter of time. But we'll made- doesn't leak or anything like that. Feels real solid and glass has substance. I would definitely recommend. Update: I've had 2 of these now for 2 years. The hummers love them! Still recommend them for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Nxactly

customer_reviews.title: Leaking everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I am having a terrible time keeping this from leaking. I have read the reviews and someone mentioned that if it gets warm it leaks. Well I put cool liquid in it and all it does is leak. Shouldn’t there be some gasket on it to prevent that? I am very disappointed. If there is no solution I’ll have to return it!
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: No issues, no mold, no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Being glass and metal, this is the easiest to clean feeder I have! I am tossing my plastic ones to buy more of these. I had no idea different feeders could make such a difference. The yellow plastic flowers on other feeders always blacken with mold but I never have that problem on this one, nor does it get murky. Simple and attractive and effective!
customer_reviews.author: kittymama

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Poor delivery!
customer_reviews.text: This item gets a poor review because of the sellers lack of shipping care. The item is a good one if you receive it in one piece. They do not use ANY shipping buffers in the box that is TOO big for the feeder. Consequently it bangs around in the box during shipping. The first one I received had a crack in the neck and the second one was bent on the metal feeding tray. Great item. Poor delivery!
customer_reviews.author: T P SUDBERRY

customer_reviews.title: WEAK GLASS CRACKED 1ST USE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas. She loved the look of it and her plastic one at 9 years old was starting to look beatup. We had moved and she just got it out today to use for first time. She makes her own feeder food and used hot tap water to dissolve the suger. The glass must be really weak or was micro cracked from factory as it cracked apart as soon as she added the hot mix. Tap water isn't that hot, can put hand under it without burning. TOO bad as it was a nice looking unit. Ok if you use cold mix, although maybe not with such weak Glass.
customer_reviews.author: LovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: ⚠ Fragile - Glass Breaks / Wire Hanger Breaks ⚠
customer_reviews.text: Hello and welcome to my quick review. We've owned two of these and there are pros and cons to it. First of all it's attractive and the hummingbirds enjoy it. The next best thing is it's easy to clean. If this feeder was durable I'd give it 4 stars but alas, it's as fragile as glass butterfly wings. The first one broke washing it in the sink and the second one broke all by itself. The wire you hang it with broke in two (see image) and it just fell to the ground, shattering - like my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: The Mighty Gamera

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Feeder
customer_reviews.text: My Hummingbirds have gotten very spoiled over the years I've been feeding them, which is totally my doing. I just love the little fellas and gals! They are going through about 2 gallons a week and this feeder is helping alot because it holds a bit more than the normal 8 oz feeders they like. I purchased a couple of ant guards to hang them from and now the ants don't devour their nector I make for them. This is very well built, HEAVY duty glass! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: LyndaZP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love the vintage look of the red glass, I make my own nectar, I don't like to use the red premade stuff. I have had my feeder for 5 days and already have 4 hummingbirds. I change the nectar daily to prevent mold with this horrible heat. They seem to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and practical
customer_reviews.text: This is not the prettiest hummingbird feeder, can be a little more interesting, but that is a matter of taste. Not sure why they decided to use GREAT metal materials everywhere EXCEPT the cheap plastic bottom... we shall see if it lasts. So far, after a couple of weeks, everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: dynsight

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: What a great hummingbird feeder! Since it is so important to keep hummers’ food source clean, having the nice wide mouth on the jar makes it a breeze to take care of! This is our sixth feeder by More Birds and they all live up to their name — we enjoy More Birds every year!
customer_reviews.author: Barb S.

customer_reviews.title: Stands the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this feeder in 2017, along with another feeder of a different style. Fast forward to 2019. It is time to buy a third feeder. I’m going to rebuy this feeder because it has held up really well the last couple of years. The metal is a bit rusty, but still solid and useable. Plus, it is easy to get the bottle cleaning brush in for a thorough cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: OneFromDayOne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty feeders
customer_reviews.text: It took forever for these to arrive. I did not realize the base would be plastic; I thought it was all metal. However, I am pleased with the way it looks. And most importantly the hummingbirds have acclimated quickly. I do not believe they leak as much as my previous feeders. They appear to be easy to clean; however, I have not had to clean them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Best hummingbird feeder ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hummingbird feeder.I have tried so many styles over the years. Plastic is not good if you are like me and use vegetable oil on top to prevent ant attacks. I also like to give them a "seat" to give their busy bodies a rest. It is so easy to clean thanks to the wide opening plus easier to fill thanks to the wide opening. The best part is that there is no "red" glass to start chipping off like the other glass feeders. It stays light green and looks nice. No problem attracting the hummers as they look for the red flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Johns

customer_reviews.title: Leaks non stop
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 thinking they were really nice quality and pretty. Despite trying multiple times to disassemble and tighten, these feeders do not hold liquid. They leak until there is nothing left. Clearly the design is lousy! I would not recommend at all. Despite how they look, they don't work.
customer_reviews.author: New England Customer

customer_reviews.title: They leak all of your nectar
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these. They are beautiful however, 2 of them have leaked all of the nectar out overnight since we got them. We thought perhaps it was the wind, but even on calm nights, we awake to empty feeders. My husband attempted to make rubber gaskets to make the connections tight, but no use. I figured because of their cost, they would be better made, but evidently not. So out of 3 feeders...2 are junk
customer_reviews.author: shelli leclair

customer_reviews.title: Thanks guys, a well deserved 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I give VERY few 5 star ratings (I think if everything average is 5 stars...nothing is special). This feeder is special! We currently have 9 hummingbird feeders active here, and this model is by far the best. Its well built, solid, glass, and they love the perches. And, it plenty big to keep it full (20 oz). I wouldn't ever waste my money on anything else again....this is it! Thanks guys, a well deserved 5 stars!!! Dave (in Colorado)
customer_reviews.author: Agape Music

customer_reviews.title: The top broke off first time I washed it
customer_reviews.text: Used for one week, first time I went to hand wash it, the top (which is supposed to be solid) completely slid off, like a clean break. I tried screwing on the bottom and filling it from the top so I could still use it temporarily, and the pressure makes the nectar squirt everywhere. So disappointed. Ordered a new one, but meanwhile the hummingbirds are coming around looking for the feeder and not finding it.
customer_reviews.author: N.B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, durable, and popular with the hummingbirds
customer_reviews.text: My hummingbirds love this feeder. I like how it is easy to clean because of the wide mouth and it looks nice. I have had mine for a few years without any issues. I recently purchased one for my father and he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: ghostrider44

customer_reviews.title: My favorite feeder
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding hummingbirds for more than 30 years, and go through 1-1/2 gallons of nectar daily. When I added this new feeder design, the birds immediately took to it, and prefer it to my other feeders without perches. Not only is this the most attractive feeder I own, but it's the easiest to clean, so it's definitely my favorite! Filling it almost to the top, it holds 23 ounces. The glass container opening is large enough that I can easily clean it with a handled brush. Out of all the different feeders I've used over the years, this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: It's attracting birds!
customer_reviews.text: The feeder appears well constructed. The top hanging hardware appears a bit flimsy, but it is doing it's job. Time will tell. We are attracting a lot of humming birds . . they seem to like the feeder and our sugar water. We're pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S

customer_reviews.title: These are attractive and easy to clean - BUT
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive and easy to clean - BUT, beware when handling as the glass is not one piece, the top is attached separately from the tube portion and one small bump, poof, it's off.
customer_reviews.author: TruthinAdvertising

customer_reviews.title: The glass is nice and thick as well as the wire to hang ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made bird feeder. The glass is nice and thick as well as the wire to hang it. I especially like that the base is made out of two parts with a metal top and a plastic bottom to prevent rusting. It is easy to clean and the hummingbirds were immediately attracted to it with no problems. My original bird feeder didn't have perches, and I like the added feature on this one. It's fun to watch the hummingbirds rest on them.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Leaks out the bottom
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was great, but was wondering how I was going through so much sugar water. Came to realize, the plastic dish part that the water sits in doesn’t get tight enough to the metal top part that has the feeding holes on it. So when there’s a breeze or wind and the feeder sways the seal being loose makes the water spill out of the bottom.. not out of the feeding holes but the actual bottom of the feeder. Wastes so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Baker

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS LIKE CRAZY!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my feeder yesterday and quickly cleaned it and filled it and tightened it and as I turned it over to hang it half the liquid leaked out from where the bottom connects to the flower feeder part. I took it down, tightened it again with the same result! It’s very pretty but I am returning it immediately!! Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder
customer_reviews.text: Great feeder and the hummingbirds have already been attracted to it. Love the base where they can perch and drink the nectar. Seems to be made extremely well. Not sure if this is a stained glass or not, and hope the redness of the glass holds it form. Time and weather will tell. So far, so good, and highly recommend. Four Stars only because time will tell if it stays true to it's color. Many other glass feeders like this one have not, and start to peel the paint off the glass.
customer_reviews.author: J.Wallace

customer_reviews.title: No bird attractor
customer_reviews.text: Hummingbirds do not like black which is the color of the base. They are not attracted to green the color of the glass. Whoever designed this feeder knows nothing about hummingbirds. If all you want is a yard ornament item is that. A hummingbird feeder—shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lauralee Barton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not functional
customer_reviews.text: This is really pretty to look at but it doesn’t HMH straight. We’ve tried to adjust it but it’s just permanently crooked. It also initially leaks when you fill it after flipping it. I though the first time I didn’t screen it in properly but it’s just the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Carly’s Picks

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: 2 hours after hanging it up and filling I saw the first Hummingbird. I was actually pretty thrilled to see one. They are mysterious in a way. Hopefully it becomes commonplace now that I have the feeder. 1/4 cup sugar and 2 cups of water.
customer_reviews.author: r3vi3ws4u

customer_reviews.title: Hummers love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this for over two years. It is the on most favored (of four feeders) by the hummingbirds that visit our SoCal yard. Sitting on the flat top, it is easy to fill. The wide mouth makes for easy cleaning. The “collar” (the part that has the flowers) is metal and seems less susceptible to mold. The only issue is that the hanging loop came apart where welded to the ring that holds the bottle. A zip tie fixed that. Highly recommend this feeder!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looks very pretty. I just filled it and hung it up and it didn’t leak at all. I’m worried about it getting hot in the sun though, but it looked like they are all metal except for the cheap plastic ones. Update- I've never seen so many hummingbirds at once before. There was at least 15 flying around it today. They drank more than half just today. I live in the middle of the desert so I was worried about not being able to attract them. Now I just can't believe how many there are.
customer_reviews.author: JKDZ

customer_reviews.title: Have 2 of These
customer_reviews.text: I use with the clear hummingbird solution. They seem to love it. Requires you hang on something so I purchased a couple of those steel Moses staffs that you stick in the ground. Simply unscrew the base, fill and close. The cool part is the birds have a little perch they can rest on to drink. That is the best part.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: My choice for a hummingbird feeder!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hummingbird feeder of this type that I've bought. The hummingbirds always drain this one and the other one like it first, if that means anything. What I really like about this one is that you can wash each piece thoroughly with no hidden areas that can mold. It's a winner. Also I appreciate the fact that it is metal and glass, not plastic. It's beautiful too.
customer_reviews.author: immom

customer_reviews.title: A very good feeder
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best hummingbird feeders on the market. Wide mouth glass jar, easy to fill and easy to clean. The base comes apart in two sections and is very easy to clean too. It all goes back together after cleaning quite easily. 20 oz capacity is not the largest around but is an adequate capacity. All in all, a very good hummingbird feeder. Best of all, the birds love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect feeder? Maybe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after purchasing the same one earlier. It worked so well that I am replacing others with poor designs. The jar is easy to clean with the wide mouth and the base is shallow so the birds can get to all the juice. I have no complaints and will likely get a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Better than any of our others
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife, who likes it so far. When a picky woman engineer says "wow" it is a great start. Stable and plenty big for transition seasons with our 2 dozen typical hummers. The base has a channeled reservoir - so it doesn't fill all the way to the edge (but still fills where tongues go). Ingenious way to minimize waste and make cleaning easier. Seems solid and it goes into service this week.
customer_reviews.author: Darbonzo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, brids love the perches and it very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The wide mouth makes it very easy to clean and has been dishwasher safe. The 5 individual perches are in constant use by the hummingbirds. It is easy to hang and looks sharp! I liked it so much I bought and second and third one.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn H

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to fill!
customer_reviews.text: This hummingbird feeder is great. Well made, and easy to fill because of the wider mouth - the birds visit regularly, and keep me busy refilling so that’s a nice feature. The handle opening is more spacious than another one I have which also makes it easier to hang once full. I managed to buy this when it was under $12, so I bought two - definitely satisfied with that decision!
customer_reviews.author: SJ May

product_meta.title: More Birds Vintage Hummingbird Feeder, Antique Glass Bottle, 5 Feeding Ports and 20-Ounce Nectar Capacity
product_meta.description: Color:ClearThe More Birds Vintage Hummingbird feeder with its beautiful burnt penny finish and aqua-tinted antique glass design give it a vintage feel that adds a splash of bygone beauty to your backyard. The Vintage hummingbird feeder features a glass nectar bottle and durable metal basin cap with five integrated perch stations and red flower feeding ports to attract more hummingbirds. With a 20 ounce nectar capacity, the Vintage provides plenty of nectar to keep hummingbirds happy and coming back for more! Its wide bottle opening and detachable flat base make filling easy and cleaning a breeze. When cleaning your hummingbird feeder, do not put your feeder in the dishwasher, as the high temperatures can permanently damage the feeder parts. Most expert sources discourage dishwashing because it may not fully disinfect any avian diseases. Additionally, dishwashers could strip the paint off painted glass components or ruin the finish on metal components and it voids the warranty.
feature_bullets: Nectar capacity: Holds 20 fluid ounces of hummingbird nectar
Feeding ports: Features five flower shaped feeding ports to accommodate multiple hummingbirds
Beautiful design: Vintage bottle design provides an antique feel with burnt penny finish base
Attract more hummingbirds: Red is a hummingbird's favorite color; attract more with the red flower feeding ports
Easy cleaning: We recommend washing your hummingbird feeder by hand with warm soapy water. Please refrain from putting your feeder in the dishwasher

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,599 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
